name: Tool Swapper
subtitle: Used to show details about the tool inside a pedestal.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Gotten by $(l)Crouch + Right Click (In Air)$() with an $(l:pedestals:tools/upgradetool)Upgrade Tool$()

pages.title: Interactions
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Right Click$() a pedestal with a tool in it to get details about the inserted tool. $(li)When in the $(l)OFFHAND, LEFT CLICK$() a pedestal to remove its inserted tool. $(li)$(l)Crouch Right Click$() in the air to swap this into the $(l:pedestals:tools/filtertool)Filter Tool$()
